bibl.title: The Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton, F.S.A. Volume I.
bibl.seg: Bell H.I. and C.H. Roberts, The Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton, F.S.A. Volume I.
London, Emery Walker, 1948, 8°, xiv-182 pp. et 51 pll.

C.R. par Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 29 (1949) p. 172. - Lionel Casson, CP 48 (1953) p. 55. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 21 (1952) pp. 262-264. - Emil Kiessling, Gnomon 26 (1954) pp. 240-244. - Naphtali Lewis, Classical Weekly 44 (1951) pp. 152-153. - Victor Martin, MusHelv 11 (1954) p. 246. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 25 (1950) No. 331-338.
